quest.name: Shadows in the Empire
journal: Hien has a request for the Scions.
objectives: Speak with Lyse in the Doman Enclave.
Speak with Hien at the Kienkan.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Forgive me, I need a moment.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: On present evidence, we have no reason to fear the worst. More than that I cannot say.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We are no closer to establishing Master Alphinaud's whereabouts, and the suggestion of an imperial plot only compounds matters. We have much to consider.

dialogue.name: KIENKANGATEKEEPER03028
dialogue.text: Lord Hien is expecting you. May I show you in?

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: Enter the Kienkan?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I had hoped to steal a moment's rest after our little outing, but it would seem duty calls. A foreign emissary arrived in my absence.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Do not let us keep you then.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Actually...I was wondering if you might join me. I cannot think of a guest who could fail to be impressed by the presence of the Scions─at least, none I should be happy to receive.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Of course─if you think it will be useful.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Thank you. Let us return to my manor, then.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Yugiri assures me the task of searching is best left to her comrades. I shall trust to their experience and focus on what I can do.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: That the Alliance would extend an invitation to Doma bespeaks the depth of their concern. Nor are they misguided. If Garlemald has fallen under Ascian control, the threat we face is incalculable.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: While we are happy to cooperate with the Eorzean Alliance, there are many things that Doma must do alone.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Don't worry. Alphinaud's been through countless trials and come out stronger every time. He'll be back, I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: My advisors and I will presently convene to discuss the matter of Doma's defenses. You are welcome to stay, of course...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Had you not offered, I would have requested leave to remain. Where the Ascians are concerned, naught may be left to chance.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: As ever, we would benefit from your experience.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I thank you for coming, Lyse─even if it was on official business. I had hoped there might be time to show you the land you helped to save, but I will settle for a fleeting visit if needs must.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: There never does seem to be enough time for anything, does there... But I did get to see a little of the enclave. You've made excellent progress, I must say! And soon you'll have the chance to see how we're getting on too. Till the meeting, then!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: ...Um, Forename? I was wondering if I might have a word with you before I go. In private.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Go on, my friend. I will send for Hakuro and the others in the meantime.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Great. I'll wait for you at the docks.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What does Lyse want to talk about, I wonder...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Go on and see what Lyse wants. I promise we won't begin without you.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: So the Eorzean Alliance has invited Doma to attend a council. I had wondered if that might be the purpose of Mistress Lyse's visit.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thanks for coming. Knowing you, you've probably guessed what I wanted to talk about.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Alisaie. She's acting as if everything's all right, but it's clear she's barely coping.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: The Alisaie I know is overbearing, willful, and reckless─and that's fine. It's how she deals with feeling weak. She has to keep moving, or she's afraid she'll fall apart.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: ...A lot like me.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: But the thing about people like us is that we need someone to keep an eye on us. I had Papalymo, and now I have my friends in the Resistance. And Alisaie has you and the Scions.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Before you start, I'm not saying you're neglecting her. I'm sure you aren't, and I'm sure you won't─but she's a good friend, and when I see her like this, I can't help worrying. So please, make sure you give her all the support she needs, all right?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Leave it to me.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You've nothing to worry about. Seriously.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. It goes without saying, but if there's anything I can do, you only need to ask.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Well, I'd best be off. See you in Ala Mhigo!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Is everything all right with Lyse? I won't ask for details─I know you'd tell me if it were important.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I daresay I can guess the subject of your discussion with Lyse. She too was never one for concealment. Fortunately for you, the individual in question seems none the wiser.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Your return is most timely. We have just apprised those newly arrived of where matters stand.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: We all had our suspicions from the start, but a part of me was credulous enough to believe the Empire's promises. Never again. The imperial court is a nest of vipers, and any peace they offer is laced with poison.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, my friend. Everyone has assembled, so let us begin.
